name: Maya 4772
description:
Maya 4772 is the last day of the Mayan short calendar. On this day, the cycle ends, to leave room for a new cycle. In this honor, the last human being who has kept his body envelope is sacrificed in a final ceremony.

You are this human.

An entire fake city is built for you and the digitized inhabitants of the Mayan civilization will escort you to a pyramid erected in front of you. On this pyramid, a last honor will be given to the gods, ending forever the human organic life.
